summary: A small house located right beside Half-Moon Mill. Has every amenity you need in the house and in the basement there is a modest bar, smithing area, study, hidden cellar, two followers Outside across and under the bridge there is a small adventure in a cave involving a blades patrol lost in a sinkhole. Outside there is a sitting area, chicken coup,
descriptionHtml:
The deer stand and cottage both have map markers.
The chicken coup is on the side of the house.

Outside across and under the bridge there is a small adventure in a cave involving a blades patrol lost in a sinkhole. Lost mead quest has no markers so you\'ll just have to figure it out on your own.

It may sound small and cluttered but it\'s really quite homely

In the cottage you have:
8 weapon racks
2 shield racks
enchanting and alchemy tables
anvil, sharpener, workbench
tanning rack upstairs
plenty of storage, fireplace

In the basement you have:
8 mannequins
7 weapons display racks
20 weapon racks
Bar and barkeep
2 followers
A blacksmith who is also a follower
bard and merchant
hidden cellar and unique wine, mead, and moonshine (the key to the mead in hidden in the wine racks)
enchanting and alchemy tables
anvil, sharpener, workbench, smelter, tanning rack, storage
study
lower basement:
A small garden pond

Hope you all like it.
author: Nonstron1492
